smartfilterbar:ControlConfiguration.label: {i18n>POSTING_DATE}
smartfilterbar:ControlConfiguration.conditionType: { module: 'sap.ui.comp.config.condition.DateRangeType', operations: { filter: { path: 'key', contains: 'WEEK', exclude:true } } }

smartfilterbar:ControlConfiguration.label: {i18n>DOCUMENT_DATE}
smartfilterbar:ControlConfiguration.conditionType: { module: 'sap.ui.comp.config.condition.DateRangeType', operations: { filter: { path: 'key', contains: 'WEEK', exclude:true } } }
